product_name: Ga.Ma Italy ProfessionalIQ Perfetto - Rose Gold
summary: SummaryGa.Ma Italy Professional's IQ Perfetto is the world's lightest hair dryer, weighing in at only 10.3 ounces. It offers professional performance while drying hair 30% faster.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe world's lightest blow dryerDries hair 30% fasterExtraordinary motor lifeOnly 78 dB of noise12 combinations: 3 speeds/3 temperatures/cool air shotFeaturesOxy Active Technology emits active oxygen with anti-bacterial properties, for shiny elastic hair & better color fixationInnovative Micro-Filter prevents the passage of even the smallest dirt particles into the motor & hairVenturi Effect multiplies the air-flow dispensed by the motor via vacuum effect, without using extra powerIntelligent Brushless motor speed of 100.000 rpmAuto-clean capability rotates the turbine in reverse direction, deep cleaning the filterAuto Diagnostics System highlights any operating problemsMemory function system allows for speed & temperature memorization3m/9.9 ft power cordIncludes1 x 68mm/2.5 in. concentrator nozzle1 x 96m/3.65 in. concentrator nozzle1x DiffuserItem 2586201California Prop65 WarningWARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which are known to the state of California to cause cancerLearn more at www.P65Warnings.ca.govShipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: BROKE AFTER 3 USES
reviews.comments: The on /off button stoped working afrer 3 uses ,and ulta won't accept an exchange or return ! I had such high hopes dor this dryer , after i fractured my forearm i needed a light hair dryer to cut off the stress on my recovering hand but i didn't get to use it more than 3 times . I wish i listened to negative reviews !

reviews.headline: Poor quality
reviews.comments: I had this product less than 1 year when the filament burnt out, no longer giving me heat. I only used the blow dryer, maybe half-dozen times, because I usually let my hair air-dry. I was told this has been a problem with this blow dryer, but neither Ulta or IQ Perfetto would replace it. Very disappointed. I sent it to a gentleman for repair which cost me another $70 for repair and s/h.  The cord is also bulky and heavy.

reviews.headline: Lasted One Year
reviews.comments: I am very upset with this purchase. I bought this in June of 2024 and it is now July of 2025. At first, the dryer heated up quickly and I appreciated the efficiency. However, during the past few months, it has taken about 15 seconds or longer to heat up. There were several times when I was working that it just didn't turn on. The screw cap on the end falls off easily- I am lucky I didn't lose any parts. Lastly, the worst part is that the warranty is 12 months. And it stopped working at officially 13 months so I'm unable to return/exchange it. Do not purchase!! Money is better spent on a higher quality built dryer!!

reviews.headline: Traded this for my Dyson
reviews.comments: I have been using my dyson for years until I saw this one on sale. I took a chance and ordered it and now only reach for this one. It is light but strong. I'd recommend tryinf it out!

reviews.headline: Proceed with caution
reviews.comments: I'm a 16 year hairstylist and was so upset I wasted money on this. It constantly cuts off.

reviews.headline: LOVE it!
reviews.comments: This is the BEST hair dryer ever. I have long, incredibly thick hair and i can blow dry my hair from sopping wet to fully dry in 10 minutes or less. It's incredibly light too, and so pretty.

reviews.headline: Excellent dryer, but has its drawbacks
reviews.comments: I purchased this hairdryer in September 2024. In the interest of full disclosure, it was on sale, and I used my points. I do love this dryer. The power is beyond any dryer I've used, it's almost too much! I do not find it that much quieter than your average hair dryer though. It does dry hair quicker, especially if you leave it on the high speed/heat setting. And my hair looks phenomenal. Very shiny and full! I do have my issues. The first is that the concentrators do not stay on well, at least the larger one. It tends to go flying off while using. Second, like other people said, is the HUGE, BULKY CORD! For such a petite dryer, it's kind of ridiculous! But my worst complaint is that the setting lights for the speed no longer come on at all. Luckily you can easily hear what speed setting it's on, but for such an expensive dryer that's less than 6 months old, I'm disappointed. Overall, I would recommend it, but the quality for such a pricey item could be improved.

reviews.headline: Light and Professional
reviews.comments: Excellent grade dryer for all hair types. Super lightweight. Love the color!

reviews.headline: It's not the greatest, but it gets the job done
reviews.comments: I purchased this to keep in my suitcase for easy traveling. I was tired of lugging around my bulky dyson. The only issues I had was in the hotel it just stops working when it overheats. I have thick long hair. I blow dry half my hair then do my makeup & blow dry the remaining wet hair. Other than that I like that its not clunky and fits in my suitcase. Its better than a hotel blow dryer. I wish I would've purchased the Shark brand alternative instead.

reviews.headline: Fantastic! I like this hairdryer: light weight, fast and pow
reviews.comments: Fantastic! I like this hairdryer: light weight, fast and powerful. I always take it with me in any trips and vacation.

reviews.headline: Best Hairdryer EVER!
reviews.comments: I have been searching for a quiet and lightweight hairdryer for years.  This one fits the bill.  I have struggled to dry my hair with 3 different dryers since having shoulder replacements, and this is the first time that I can dry my hair without pain.  It is also so much quieter than others.  So far, it works great.  I have yet to use the high heat or fan settings because the heat on the lowest setting with my short pixie haircut is very hot.  Likewise, I only use the first 2 fan settings as I don't have thick or long hair, and have no need to blow dry for long.  I think this dryer has also added volume and body to my style, which is a blessing.

reviews.headline: Lightweight and powerful!
reviews.comments: I am not strong and doing my hair takes a while with regular blow dryers. I have the Dyson and the Infiniti and this one is the one that I always reach to grab. it's sooooo lightweight so it's not a chore to use if you aren't all that strong. love it! and I have a mix of 4a, b and c hair so if you know you know...

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend
reviews.comments: Is amazing and is super fast drying my hair. Love the different settings and the cooling settings. I've also used on my both sons hair and they love it. No real negatives to put in. Definitely worth the money especially if you use everyday. Great product

reviews.headline: DO NOT PURCHASE
reviews.comments: I read the reviews but since there were only a handful of negative ones I decided to still purchase it. I returned it because within 5 minutes it over heated and stopped working AND it shut the electricity in my house. Don't buy this.

reviews.headline: Easy to handle
reviews.comments: This is the dryer my hair stylist uses and I had to get it for myself. It's very practical to handle because it's so light.

reviews.headline: Love my new hairdryer
reviews.comments: I bought this dryer because my daughter has one in her salon. She showed me all the features of it and I really liked it. Thanks to a great sale I was able to get this for myself. I love that it has memory settings but especially because it is so lightweight. It's very quiet which helps while others are sleeping in the morning. I also love the self cleaning feature. The only thing I don't like about it is the cord. Very long and thick. Not the easiest for storage.

reviews.headline: Totally Thrilled!
reviews.comments:
I was pleasantly surprised by just how much I love this dryer! It's very lightweight. I like how you can set the controls and then lock them easily so that they don't get bumped while you're in the process of drying your hair. 
I had read that the cord was heavy. It's a bit bulky but not troublesome. The cool button locks in the curls. It's also very streamlined and pretty!

reviews.headline: Been looking for exactly this
reviews.comments: I have wanted a small powerful dryer with a great cold button. Constantly disappointed. Yes, the cord is thick but it needs to provide the power it puts out. Works for me.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: I wanted a lighter hair dryer so I thought I would try this one. I used it three times and returned it. My hair was like straw not sure why. But I used my old one babybliss pro rapito and my hair is shiny and smooth.  So not for me

reviews.headline: I would recommend for professionals
reviews.comments: Dries super fast for my thin hair. Has so many settings and love the cool blow. Very sleek and cool looking. Would recommend to any hair stylist or someone that uses it multiple time a day. Also works good on my sons who have longer hair. Its a bit pricey for me though

media.caption: Very gentle on my fine hair. It locked in my curls.

faceoff_positive.comments:
The culprit of this review was a stylish hair dryer from the Italian brand GAMA PROFESSIONAL, namely the iQ PERFETTO (it is also considered a direct competitor to the Dyson Supersonic hair dryer), which I received as a gift!!!! ü•∞‚ù§Ô∏èüòç
Italian quality speaks for itself, starting with the packaging. Everything is done very cool, the materials are absolutely pleasant to the touch. The hair dryer itself is covered with a protective transparent film.  This hair dryer captivated me with its design and weight! The hand does not get tired at all, which is a huge plus, especially for those with long hair.
The hairdryer didn't dry out my hair at all and didn't fluff it up. With it, my hair became well-groomed and manageable (even the girl who cuts the hair was surprised how the hair structure changed for the better, while I didn't change the care). A separate topic is its noise, because there is practically none. He's very quiet. and I noticed that my hair actually stays clean longer and gets less dirty!! The conclusion is this: HAIRDRYER IS GORGEOUS! I'm happy!!  üòÉ
faceoff_positive.headline: My hair looks much better with this hairdryer!! I love it! ‚ù§

faceoff_negative.comments: I am very upset with this purchase. I bought this in June of 2024 and it is now July of 2025. At first, the dryer heated up quickly and I appreciated the efficiency. However, during the past few months, it has taken about 15 seconds or longer to heat up. There were several times when I was working that it just didn't turn on. The screw cap on the end falls off easily- I am lucky I didn't lose any parts. Lastly, the worst part is that the warranty is 12 months. And it stopped working at officially 13 months so I'm unable to return/exchange it. Do not purchase!! Money is better spent on a higher quality built dryer!!
